text: The passing of the value of directive DocumentRoot apparently is passed to a CGI process as environment variable DOCUMENT_ROOT but it is not documented.  There may be other such variables affected by other directives.
creator: tom.browder@gmail.com

text:
Hi Tom,

this bug is a duplicate of https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=58305, do you mind if I consolidate the two?

Luca
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com

text:
I'll prioritise https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=58305 adding some info about DOCUMENT_ROOT and about the function responsible for setting it, then I'll come back to this one to add a comprehensive list of env variables set. The code needs to be "parsed" and it might take a bit of time :)

Luca
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
toscano.luca@gmail.com
text:
All right new version of the documentation in:

https://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/mod/mod_cgi.html

I'll backport to 2.4/2.2 soon if nobody is against it. To summarise what has been added to mod_cgi's doc:

- reference to the variables responsible for setting the CGI environment, together with doxygen links.
- new variables set like DOCUMENT_ROOT together with their relationship with httpd directives.
- a note about a quick workaround to get all the variables set with a cgi script to have a complete view.

Tom, would you mind to take a look and let me know your opinion?

Luca
Remaining step: check whether or not this patch should be backported to 2.2.x
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com

text:
Backported to 2.2.x.

Tom, I haven't heard from you so I am going to close this bug since the fix has been rolled out in my opinion. If you feel that the new documentation is not enough, please feel free to re-open this bug!

Thanks!

Luca
